module.name: Asterisk Logfiles
module.changelog: *2.11.1.3* FREEPBX-7375 missing ? on insert *2.11.1.2* More tweaks to color *2.11.1.1* FREEPBX-7339 For the ampersand *2.11.1.0* FREEPBX-7250 Completely re design how log files looks. *2.11.0.10* Add license info *2.11.0.9* #7200 Solve The case of the missing logfiles. *2.11.0.7* #7014 fixes back array population *2.11.0.6* Fix fatal error on install because of improperly set variables *2.11.0.5* #6982 Add security message and fix tooltips, courtesy of Xorcom *2.11.0.4* Missing Files fix *2.11.0.3* #6548 Fix highlighting links in navigation *2.11.0.2* #6675 checked against incorrect link *2.11.0.1* #6675 *2.11.0.0* added ability to view all logfiles *2.10.0.13* re #1317 - remove debug *2.10.0.12* re #1317 - move settings page to settings catagory; fix opts saving/display inconsistancies *2.10.0.11* Packaging of ver 2.10.0.11 *2.10.0.10* re #1143, #1122 - *2.10.0.9* re #1122 -
